CMS Final Rate -: Bear put spreads on MA-heavy insurers (30–60 DTE); exits: +40–60% spread gain or time stop t−20D
CFPB Late Fee Cap: Debit put spreads on fee-dependent issuers (21–45 DTE); roll on appeals
DOE LNG Pause: Puts on LNG developers (30–90 DTE) + call spreads on XLU
SEC Disclosure Rule: Debit put spreads on high-burden fintechs (30–60 DTE)
MBA Delinquency Spike: Puts on REM; calendars/call spreads on GSE proxies
